values: Dependence, Independence, and Interdependence | Garrett Treece

Pastor Steve Jeffery talks with Garrett Treece about dependence, independence, and interdependence. They discuss the realities of our needs for others within the church; the perils of victimhood; the dangers of misplaced responses to victimhood; the mutual responsibilities of members of the body of Christ; and other topics.
